archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.3.8d: d) only use their privileged User ID for undertaking administrative tasks and not for day-to-day general tasks (e.g. checking email, accessing the web), maintaining a separate standard identity for these activities
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
